title: Barack Obama says you can't get Ebola on a bus or a plane.
text: President Barack Obama has sought to allay the fears of Ebola in the face of panic and delusion. In his 18th weekly speech on October, he called on people to "be guided by science and "remember the basic facts." Obama said, "Ebola is actually a difficult disease." This last line, frequently repeated in various forms by the Department, has provoked the anger of critics, who believe that the statement is too disturbing.
